cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Security Advisory: unzip security update
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2021 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

full_product_name.product_name: unzip-0:6.0-43.el8 as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux BaseOS (v. 8)

notes.note: unzip: overlapping of files in ZIP container leads to denial of service

reference.description: bz#1727761: CVE-2019-13232 unzip: overlapping of files in ZIP container leads to denial of service

remediation.description:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

note:
An update for unzip is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Low. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

The unzip utility is used to list, test, and extract files from zip archives.
Security Fix(es):
* unzip: overlapping of files in ZIP container leads to denial of service (CVE-2019-13232)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.2 Release Notes linked from the References section.
